attributes.action: Reconsider the ruling on ex-Gurkhas who retired before 1997 not being allowed to claim citizensip in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Friday 24th April 2009, British government badly let down the Gurkhas. A decision was made, which will result in huge numbers of ex-Gurkhas, who retired pre 1997, not being allowed to claim British citizenship.

This decision is despicable, and we need to work together to have the decision rovoked.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
